name: Just Another Level Editor
description:
This is a singleplayer prototype.

It contains:

  • 3 different gravity-manipulating symbols (Directional, top-down, preserve-last)
  • Slopes, with specialized slope physics
  • A janky slightly less janky camera!
  • Stock graphics thanks to kenney.nl!

Controls:

Space: Jump

R: Rotate block

WASD: Move

S: Slide down slopes

Mouse left/right: Place blocks, pick from palette

ESC: Return to starting platform

The discord for this, as well as my other games, can be found here.
